description: Running npm run lint fails due to ESLint errors in worker/.wrangler/tmp/dev-*/index.js (generated). Consider updating lint config to ignore worker temp output or clean the directory before lint.

title: Add CLI setup page with installation instructions
description:
Create a page (e.g., /cli or /setup) with:
- Explanation of what the CLI does (create share links from terminal)
- curl | bash one-liner installation command
- Usage examples
- Requirements (bash, curl)

Should link to this from the main page or header.

title: Add SEO essentials: meta tags, Open Graph, robots.txt, sitemap
description:
Improve discoverability and link sharing:

**Meta tags:**
- Title, description, keywords
- Open Graph tags (og:title, og:description, og:image, og:url)
- Twitter Card tags

**SEO files:**
- robots.txt (allow all, point to sitemap)
- sitemap.xml (main page, maybe /cli if we add that)
- Canonical URLs

**Bonus:**
- Structured data (JSON-LD) if applicable
- Consider dynamic OG tags for shared documents (show preview of content)

title: Add analytics
description:
Add basic analytics to understand usage:

**Options to consider:**
- Cloudflare Web Analytics (free, privacy-friendly, no JS needed)
- Plausible/Fathom (privacy-friendly, paid)
- Simple custom logging in Worker (share creates, retrievals)

**Key metrics:**
- Page views
- Share code creates vs retrievals
- Copy All usage (feedback exported)
- Referral sources

title: Update default API URL to specmark.dev
description:
Update all localhost defaults to use the production domain:
- src/config.js: VITE_API_URL default
- cli/annotate-md: ANNOTATE_API_URL default
- Any documentation references
close_reason: Updated all defaults to use https://specmark.dev with path-based routing (/api/*). Created public/_routes.json for Cloudflare Pages routing configuration. Updated README with complete deployment instructions.

title: Improve default feedback format and add customization options
description:
Enhance the 'Copy All' export format with:
- Improved default formatting for the generated feedback
- Customizable prefix (user can set their own prefix text)
- Toggle to include/exclude line numbers in quoted selections

The current format is basic blockquotes + comments. Add a settings panel or modal to configure these options, persisted in localStorage.

title: Add favicon
description:
Add a favicon for the site. Consider:
- Simple icon that works at small sizes
- Both .ico and .svg formats for broad compatibility
- Apple touch icon for iOS bookmarks

title: Audit error states for invalid/expired share codes
description:
Review and improve error handling UX:
- Invalid share code (doesn't exist)
- Expired share code (TTL passed)
- API unavailable/network error
- Rate limited (if applicable)

Ensure users see helpful messages, not raw errors or blank states.

title: Add onboarding/help content to main page
description:
Add information on the main input page explaining how to use specmark:
- What the tool does (annotate markdown specs for LLM feedback)
- Basic workflow: paste markdown → annotate → copy feedback
- How sharing works (share codes, 7-day expiration)

Could be inline help text, a collapsible section, or example placeholders. Should be unobtrusive for returning users.
